en.title: FE Welcomes QP Wearer, Philippines' Former First Lady Imelda Marcos!
en.content:
Philippines' former First Lady Imelda R. Marcos is now a happy wearer and endorser of FE's Quantum Products.

Mrs Imelda R. Marcos congratulates FusionExcel International for bringing Quantum Science Products such as Quantum Pendant, Bracelets and Sports Flask that produce natural Scalar Energy which is promoting good health to our body.

Photo shows FE Presidential Director Pastor Art Medina, FE Leader Jimmy Dee, ED Em Torre, Former First Lady Imelda R. Marcos, Director Mae Heredia, Mrs Sonia Mathay, and Former Congressman Chuck Mathay.
